name: AgeOfDarkness
description: Age Of Darkness is a Builder/Survival game set in the medieval period. Build up large City's and Town's with over 100 items with more on the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
